Package controller

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
controller.UserController
public class UserController extends Object
This class represents the user controller. It manages the sending and receive of UDP messages. It allows to have a static attribute of the user using the application.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public static void initialize()
      Initialize the user controller It set the port of the user. It creates a new UDP listener. It starts the UDP listener.

    • sendPseudo

      public static void sendPseudo​(String pseudo)
      Send a broadcast message to send the pseudo of the user. It sends the typeMsg PSEUDO.
      Parameters:
      pseudo - , pseudo to check

    • sendConnect

      public static void sendConnect()
      Send a broadcast message to inform that the user is connected. It sends the typeMsg CONNECT.

    • sendDisconnect

      public static void sendDisconnect()
      Send a broadcast message to inform that the user is disconnected. It sends the typeMsg DISCONNECT.

    • askUserList

      public static void askUserList()
      Send a broadcast message to ask the list of all users online. It sends the typeMsg ASK_USER_LIST.

    • sendUserList

      public static void sendUserList​(String ip)
      Send a broadcast message to send the list of all users online. It sends the typeMsg USER_LIST.

    • informationTreatment

      public static void informationTreatment​(String msg)
      Treat the message received. It checks the type of message and calls the corresponding method.
      Parameters:
      msg - , message received

    • pseudoNotPresent

      public static boolean pseudoNotPresent​(String pseudo)
      Check if the pseudo is not already present in the list of online users.
      Parameters:
      pseudo - , pseudo to check
      Returns:
      true if the pseudo is not present, false otherwise

    • getUserByPseudo

      public static User getUserByPseudo​(String pseudo)
      Find the user in the listOnline with the corresponding pseudo
      Parameters:
      pseudo - , the pseudo of the user searched
      Returns:
      the user with the corresponding pseudo

    • updateUser

      public static void updateUser​(String IP, String pseudo)
      Update the user pseudo in the listOnline
      Parameters:
      IP - , the IP of the user to update
      pseudo - , the new pseudo of the user
